src:
Kata.ai Gelar Kompetisi Developer KataHack 2019
06 Nov 2019, 04:29 by Moh Khory Alfarizi, Erwin Prima
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Dalam gelaran pengenalan inovasi baru dan wadah diskusi perkembangan dan manfaat teknologi AI, Interact 2019, Kata.ai menghadirkan peserta final KataHack 2019, kompetisi untuk para developer.
"KataHack ini perdana, bagaimana kami membuat wadah bagi para developer untuk menjawab suatu masalah. Kami melakukan road show ke empat dan kurang lebih ada 200 yang daftar, kita saring kurang lebih ada 80 ide, kita saring lagi menjadi 20 finalis dan sekarang finalnya ada lima peserta yang mempresentasikan idenya,” ujar CEO dan Co-Founder Kata.ai, Irzan Raditya, di Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
KataHack 2019 merupakan kompetisi hackathon online national yang digagas untuk melatih para developer muda Indonesia tentang pemikiran kritis, kreativitas, dan semangat problem solving yang mengandalkan solusi AI. Kata.ai menggelar road show di empat kota untuk mendapatkan peserta KataHack 2019, yaitu Jakarta, Bandung, Malang dan Yogyakarta.
Lima tim terbaik dipilih menjadi finalis yang menawarkan solusi beragam, yakni Patricia-Pernal Payment Assistant, yang merupakan chatbot untuk membantu banyak orang dalam mengatur urusan finansial sampai jadwal bayar tagihan dalam chat apps.
Kemudian ada Snowbal-KRAVE, chatbot yang bisa membantu dalam merencanakan liburan yang sesuai dengan budget. “Ada EasyFishy-AdBoard, papan iklan interaktif dengan menggunakan metode text-to speech. Kemudian, Elea-Alea Bot, chatbot berbasis teknologi untuk membantu orang yang menghadapi keluhan kesehatan mental,” kata Irzan. “Dan A4-Oti Parenting Bot, chatbot yang bisa membantu orang tua mengontrol percakapan bermuatan konten negatif menggunakan otomatisasi chatbot di grup chat.”
Irzan mengatakan di Indonesia Kata.ai mungkin menjadi satu-satunya platform teknologi yang bisa memberikan wadah bagi para developer untuk membuat aplikasi. “Bahkan bisa menampilkan dan mengiklankan karyanya. Nantinya karya mereka akan bisa diakses melalui platform namanya Katalog, seperti App Store atau Play Store begitu," tutur Irzan.
Kreasi developer tersebut bakal bisa dilihat dan digunakan oleh seluruh masyarakat Indonesia. “Apakah ke depannya akan ada kolaborasi atau lainnya kami belum pikirkan. Yang pasti ke depan kami akan mengembangkan ekosistem developer di Indonesia,” ujar Irzan.
Irzan berharap KataHack menjadi agenda tahunan Kata.ai. Karena, kata dia, jika melihat respons peserta yang cukup baik, maka akan dibuat kembali tahun depan. “Responsnya sangat positif, kami mulai tes lah untuk tahun ini, tahun depan akan kami adakan lagi dengan skala lebih besar,” tambah Irzan.
text:
Kata.ai Holds the 2019 KataHack Developer Competition
Nov 6 2019, 04:29 by Moh Khory Alfarizi, Erwin Prima
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - In the event of introducing new innovations and discussion forums on the development and benefits of AI technology, Interact 2019, Kata.ai presented the final participant of KataHack 2019, a competition for developers.
"This hack said premiere, how we made a forum for developers to answer a problem. We did a fourth road show and there were approximately 200 listed, we filtered out there were 80 ideas, we filter again into 20 finalists and now there are five finalists the participants who presented their ideas, "said CEO and Co-Founder Kata.ai, Irzan Raditya, in Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
KataHack 2019 is an online national hackathon competition that was initiated to train young Indonesian developers on critical thinking, creativity, and the spirit of problem solving that relies on AI solutions. Kata.ai held road shows in four cities to get 2019 KataHack participants, namely Jakarta, Bandung, Malang and Yogyakarta.
The five best teams are chosen to be finalists who offer a variety of solutions, namely Patricia-Pernal Payment Assistant, which is a chatbot to help many people in managing financial affairs to schedule paying bills in chat apps.
Then there's Snowbal-KRAVE, a chatbot that can help in planning a vacation that suits your budget. "There is EasyFishy-AdBoard, an interactive billboard using the text-to speech method. Then, Elea-Alea Bot, a technology-based chatbot to help people who deal with mental health complaints, "said Irzan. "And A4-Oti Parenting Bot, a chatbot that can help parents control conversations with negative content using chatbot automation in chat groups."
Irzan said that in Indonesia Kata.ai might be the only technology platform that could provide a platform for developers to create applications. "It can even display and advertise his work. "Later their works will be accessible through the platform named Catalog, such as the App Store or Play Store," said Irzan.
The developer creations will be able to be seen and used by all Indonesian people. "In the future there will be collaboration or other things we have not thought about. What is certain is that in the future we will develop a developer ecosystem in Indonesia, "said Irzan.
Irzan hopes that KataHack will become an annual agenda for Kata.ai. Because, he said, if you see a good response from the participants, it will be remade next year. "The response was very positive, we started the test for this year, next year we will hold it again on a larger scale," added Irzan.
